|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "75076230", "2013-09-17", and "REV A3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Also per the FCC photos, this device is using... *the MT7620A WiSoC *a ''Winbond''' Flash chip *an '''AIT''' AIT8433T multimedia processor *a '''Nuvoton''' NAU8810YG mono audio codec
Per the FCC label and the example label in the external photos... *the device has a default setup SSID pattern of '''NetCamHDXXXX''' (where '''XXXX''' appears to be the last 4 digits of the wireless interface MAC [upper case letters]) *a EC:1A:59 OUI is shown
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown used in the FCC external photos is a '''Belkin'''-branded '''DVE''' DSA-5PFE-05 FUS 050100.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = DVE |model = DSA-5PFE-05 FUS 050100 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.2 |input_hz=50/60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |e_level=3 |style=small, horiz. }}
